data.name: The Creek
data.description: Perfect for a quick meal or a prompt business meet, it is both a gastronomic and sensory delight. Food prepared in interactive counters on modern cooking ranges, grills and exotic clay ovens display the innovative art-form of our chefs. Walk out to Alfresco for an open air leisurely space that stands out for its unique feature of being surrounded by a trail of all day flowing water bodies.

data.name: Brew and Barbeque - Microbrewery Pub
data.description: Brew & Barbeque is popular for its Craft Brewed Beers & Global Cuisine Food Delicacies. A Texan style Brewpub straight out of the Wild West, that makes its own signature fresh beers while serving up a colossal variety of fusion global grub at the heart of the city's tech hub! Here's presenting a forerunner of Bengaluru's food and drink scene, The space has outdoor seating for guests who'd like to catch a glimpse of the setting sun while sipping on a fresh cold beer and indoor seating with three distinct set ups for the discerning lot. The open outdoor area is the perfect setting for a breezy day out with friends. The exposed brewing tanks are truly a welcome sight while the pool table is a real bonus if things get a little competitive, if you know what we mean. The tripartite indoor area can be thought of as a bar with a live performance deck, a lounge and a dining space.

data.name: Ji Hazoor Restaurant
data.description: Plush in the centre of the city lies Ji Hazoor, a space that exudes an atmosphere of a distinguished restaurant with an array of elements that are conspicuously intermixed to delight a dining experience. The food is pre-dominantly an Indian cuisine specializing in Mughlai and Punjabi that have been infused and recreated. The restaurant is named so because every person who chooses to dine there is treated like a celebrity.
data.address: ITPL Main road Near Vydehi hospital, Whitefield, Bengaluru 560066 India

data.name: Karibu
data.description: This all day dining multicuisine restaurant with a live pizza oven is located at the lobby and can seat up to 114. The Karibu offers one of the largest buffet spreads for breakfast, lunch and dinner along with a special weekend brunch accompanied by live music.Popular dishes at the Karibu are prawn Malabar curry, butter chicken masala and masala dosaOpen Hours: 24 hours

data.name: The Whitefield Arms Pub
data.description: The Whitefield Arms is a modern take on the quintessential British pub & Microbrewery and celebrates the history of Whitefield through its unique menu and Bengalurus love of beer. A living history pub with colonial-themed wooden furniture and outdoor seating, its the perfect place to catch up with friends and colleagues.

data.name: Galito's Flame Grilled Chicken
data.description: Galito's is the best tasting flame grilled chicken in the world, with massive flavour right through. Our traditional marinade is made from all natural ingredients infused with select herbs and spices. Slowly marinated for at least 24 hours, flame grilled to perfection and served to order, making it the healthiest, tastiest flame grilled chicken in town.
